actionCards.name: Mixed Signal
actionCards.description: Play at anytime. Swap another player's face downm 'Set' Attack Card with your dace down. 'Set' Attack Card

actionCards.name: Not On My Watch!
actionCards.description: Cancel any Action Card. Not effective on Attack Cards or Potion/Item Cards.

actionCards.name: Not So Fast!
actionCards.description: Cancel any Action Card and place that card into your hand. Not effective on Attack Cards or Potion/Item Cards.

actionCards.name: Edge Out
actionCards.description: Play on another player before they reveal their 'Set' Attack Card. Discard it. They may not attack this turn.

itemCards.name: Potion Of Healing
itemCards.description: Play this face up immediately when dealt. Tip to gain 25 life points. If used to heal a willing party member other than yourself, place the card in your scoring pile for 3 Prestige.

itemCards.name: Cure Wounds
itemCards.description: Play this face up immediately when dealt. Tip to gain 15 life points. If used to heal a willing party member other than yourself, place the card in your scoring pile for 2 Prestige.

characters.name: Nyx
characters.description: Nyx goes unnoticed, leaves unscathed, lines her pockets and trusts no one.

characters.name: Örn HammerFist
characters.description: Cold as mountain stone, Örn brawls when he can, levels axe when he must and trusts no one.

characters.name: Vasha The Red
characters.description: Vasha spills blood, sunders hearts, takes what she wants and trusts no one.

characters.name: Talon
characters.description: Weilding a blade named Black Claw. Talon says little, smiles less and trusts no one.

characters.name: Edaiyn Bloodthorn
characters.description: Of noble lineagem Edaiyn is sure of aim, sure of himself and trusts no one.

characters.name: Valmort
characters.description: Mage of the distant dunes. Valmort honors the dead, adds to their numbers and trusts no one.

creatures.name: RIPPER
creatures.description: When a player is damaged by RIPPER, remove a card at random from their hand.

creatures.name: BATTLE TROLL
creatures.description: The first PLAYER to damage BATTLE TROLL is attacked for 20 points. The last PLAYER to damage BATTLE TROLL is attacked for 10 points. If no one damages BATTLE TROLL, all PLAYERS are hit for 5 points.

creatures.name: ANTI-PALADIN
creatures.description: The ANTI-PALADIN attacks the entire party for 5 points and adds this total to his life Points.

creatures.name: IRON SKIN GARGOYLE
creatures.description: IRON SKIN GARGOYLE can not be damaged by attacks which cause 20 points of damage or less.
